template_data.text: May the Lord of Shadows guide you swiftly to your death!

document_data.name: Neira
document_data.text: May the Lord of Shadows guide you swiftly to your death!
document_data.Possessions: Neira fought with a [[club]] and a medium-sized [[shield]]. She wore [[splint mail]] and an ''[[Eyes of Truth]]'' [[helmet]].
